text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The day of the tryouts has come.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Though I was hoping to have formally<n>scouted Manhattan
Cafe by now, an<n>opportune moment hasn't appeared.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text: <username>, are you really looking to<n>scout her?

text_block_list.name: New Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
Sure, she's a great runner, but the<n>way she keeps going on
and on about<n>that imaginary "friend" of hers is<n>unsettling.
You're not put off by it?

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Y-you're kidding, right? I can<n>understand wanting to support
her,<n>but...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: ...Good morning.

text_block_list.name: The Two
text_block_list.text: Waaaaah! Gyaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Thud, thud, thud!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: ... I'm sorry... You were clearly in the<n>middle of something.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: ...Yes.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
There are many capable runners set<n>to take to the track
today. She'll need<n>to focus on outpacing them over<n>
anything else. Will her friend end up<n>leading the pack, I
wonder...
choice_data_list: Keep your cool and run at your own pace!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
I was sure... that you couldn't see<n>her. But it really feels
like... you can...
choice_data_list: Sorry, that was a bit quiet. Can you—

text_block_list.name: Tryouts Staff A
text_block_list.text:
The tryouts are about to begin. Would<n>the runners
participating please<n>gather—

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: ... Please come back here... this<n>evening.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The runners are at the starting gate.<n>And... they're off! The
race has begun.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
(Run... run... run... The smell of the<n>turf... The dirt is nice and
firm... I'm in<n>great form.)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
(That person's... That trainer's words<n>seem to have lent a
spring to my step.<n>My breathing is stable... I feel like I<n>
could run for much longer than<n>usual...)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (There are so many runners... in front<n>of me...)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
(But I know that she's there... I know<n>that my friend is up
there... waiting for<n>me to catch up to her.)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (No one else can see her... but she is<n>so dear to me...)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
(I never did mind that people couldn't<n>believe what they
couldn't see... I<n>only... wished that they would respect<n>
her...)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (But now...)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (That trainer... wants to know more<n>about her...)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
(Precisely because she can't be<n>seen. Just by saying that...
my friend<n>has finally gotten the respect she<n>deserves.)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Haaah!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
(We've endured so much ridicule... So<n>much cruelty... Never
been given the<n>time of day...)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
(It's time to run past all that... If I can<n>get even a little closer
to you today<n>than I could yesterday... then I...)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I can run freely... after you... after my<n>dreams!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
What acceleration! She pierces<n>through the pack like a
needle! She's<n>like a shadow swallowing everything<n>
before her!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Woooo!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In contrast to the afternoon's tryouts,<n>the track this evening
is still and silent.<n>Manhattan Cafe stands before me,<n>
pensively.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Please, can you listen to me for a<n>moment? I'd like to tell
you... about my<n>friend...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Actually... I can see many, many<n>things that others can't.
There are<n>other beings... besides my friend...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: However... No one has ever believed<n>that when I told them.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
"There's no way they exist."<n>"Creepy." "It's just your<n>
imagination." "You're delusional."<n>"It's all in your head."

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Those awful words... They only<n>served to hurt my precious<n>
companions... It made me sad, too.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Because of that... I tended to keep to<n>myself as a child. I
didn't want them<n>to be hurt... any more.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
I was always rather frail... The people<n>around me were
never too surprised<n>that I stayed mostly quiet.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
But one day... I saw a girl who looked<n>a lot like me, even if
only from behind...<n>She was running.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
And even though I couldn't see her<n>face... I could tell that
she was having<n>fun. I started to feel... envious...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I chased after... Left that dark room<n>that I had shut myself in.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
The outside world was bright...<n>Overwhelmingly so. But my
friend...<n>She was still running... Having fun...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
I began to wonder... what exactly I<n>was so afraid of. Even
though no one<n>would believe in her... she was able to<n>run
without a care...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Since then... my friend has been<n>running ever forward... In
front of me...
choice_data_list: I can see why she's so important to you.
I can see why she's so important to you.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Yes... But I've still...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: ...This whole time... I've still not seen<n>her face.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
I can't catch up... And she never<n>looks back... I've only ever
seen her<n>from behind... as she runs ever<n>forward.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: So I want... to catch up. I want to run...<n>at her side.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Though she is telling me this in her<n>usual hushed voiced, I
can sense the<n>straightforward fervor that has welled<n>up
inside her.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: ... You still can't see her, right? So...<n>Um...
choice_data_list: You can tell me more about her anytime.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
choice_data_list: I would like to scout you.
I would like to scout you.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: ... Do you think... I can catch up with<n>her?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: ...Okay!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Thwack!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I share a smile with Manhattan<n>Cafe, I feel a strong clap
on my back.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: "I trust you."

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
There's no voice—no spoken word.<n>And yet... I can feel the
sentiment<n>coming from someone.
